headline: Pool Corporation (POOL): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Pool Corp. on Andvari’s Substack’s Substack by Douglas Ott. As of 20ᵗʰ September, Pool Corp.’s share was trading at $317.92. POOL’s trailing and forward P/E were 29.33 and 26.43 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Pool Corp., founded in 1980 as South-Central Pool Supply, has grown from a single […]
